channel.title: Custom Items
channel.description:
Just added all new PVP weapons to my client, also added all the ints ect. (THE CLIENT-SIDED OF IT IS FULLY WORKING)
However, when I try and pickup the item on my server it just returns as "No such item".
I mean, I've added the item in item.cfg, is there anything else I've got to do server-based?
P.S : - I can replace the item with an already existing item and it works fine, but I cant create a entirley new item in item.cfg as it just dosen't find it.
ALSO, IT'S DELTA-BASED.

item.title: Custom Items
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Ah okay I’ll guess I will have to do that.

Will it still replace the old items appearence though?

I’m not talking about when you wear it, but I tryed it with another item and when you weilded it, it was perfect. But in the inventory it still had the old items appearence.

Example :

I changed a map peice, to a vesta longsword. When you weilded it, looked perfect. But in the inventory it was still a map.

Tnx 4 help.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Items
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It usually doesnt work when u create a new item. Just replace an unused item of the same type.

Also, Delta Sucks

Read full topic
